Title: SilverAmp
Description: A media player to demonstrate lots of new Silverlight 4 features. Running out of browser and reading files from the MyMusic folder are two of them. It is using MEF to load extensions.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A media player to demonstrate lots of new Silverlight 4 features. Running out of browser and reading files from the MyMusic folder are two of them. It is using MEF to load extensions.






I ported TagLib# to Silverlight to read the ID3 tags from the mp3 files. More info about that here
